Item.text: Data Recording records monitored data to the disk file for subsequent playback. Supports DMSLOG7 file format.
Data Recording records monitored data to the disk file for subsequent playback. New format supports writing into multiple files and limiting maximum file size.

Message.value: Data Recording has been stopped due to the following error: {error text} ({error code})

It is impossible to execute the Save to Log command now because no historical data is available for the current monitoring session. Consider adding the Data Recording processing module to a monitoring session next time or add one or more legacy data visualizers to automatically have historical data available.
Please wait while the current session is being saved to a file.

Message.description: Maximum logs in a folder reached
Message.value: Can't use more than 999 logs per single folder!

Message.description: A number of files is not limited
A minimum allows log file size
Maximum specified log file size is out of range
Message.value: Maximum single file size is out of allowed range. Allowed range is from {min} to {max}.

Message.description: Maximum specified log file count is out of range
Message.value: Maximum log file count is out of allowed range. Must be a positive integer larger than 1.

Message.description: Path is required for Save to Log mode
Message.value: Output log file path is empty.

{path}{has limits?}; {is size limit?}Max size: {size}{|is size limit}Max duration: {time}{?is size limit}{has file limit?}; {is single file?}Single file{|is single file}Up to {files} files{?is single file}{?has file limit}{?has limits}

Message.description: Failed to create a log file
Message.value: Data recording could not create an output log file. {0}.

Item.text: Save monitored session to log file
Pause recording of the current session
Stop recording of the current session
Specify location of log files for playback

Message.value: Incorrect folder specified. It cannot be used as a target folder for log files.

Message.key: Select the location the program will use to store recorded data.
Message.description: Field: Select the location the program will use to store recorded data
